{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question asks whether enhancers are directional in their targeting of gene promoters. Furthermore, the Drosophila melanogaster studies demonstrate that DNA position-specific repression of transcription by a zinc finger protein can occur through interactions between enhancers and promoters. This implies that enhancers may not necessarily have an inherent directional targeting property, but rather their interaction with gene promoters is influenced by local chromatin structure and regulatory elements.
